com.kroy.game.rendering

Class Renderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kroy.game.rendering.Renderer

  • public class Renderer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class added as a result of refractoring by Septagon Used to handle all the rendering code for the GameScene so that the GameScene class is not too overcrowded
